<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Send confirmation code by email.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/signup/{id}/code"}></MethodEndpoint>



Generates a new 5-digit code and sends it via email to the user for the purpose of verifying their account.

## Request

All requisitions must have an identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>
